Items

This component demonstrates fetching data from the server.

Loading...

Name Price Short Desc
{{ item.productName }} {{ item.price }} {{ item.description }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fetch-data', templateUrl: './fetch-data.component.html' }) export class FetchDataComponent { public items: Item[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'api/items').subscribe(result => { this.items = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface Item { productName: string; price: number; quantity: number; description: string; id: number; }
